definitions.definition: A demonstration of respect , as towards a person after his or her retirement or death.
An artistic work imitating another in a flattering style.
In feudalism , the formal oath of a vassal to honor his or her lord 's rights.

main_definition: ( countable , uncountable ) A demonstration of respect , as towards a person after his or her retirement or death.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An artistic work imitating another in a flattering style.
( historical ) In feudalism , the formal oath of a vassal to honor his or her lord 's rights.
